resources.string: \t\t\tSomeone planted the bomb, so you need to defuse it within a time, but to defuse it you need to solve a puzzle that has 4 numbers and some operators. Yes, it is a 24 game!\n\n \t\t\tGame will generate 4 numbers and you need to Find the way to make its result to 24 by using operations +, -, x, ÷, ^ and parentheses ( ) if you can’t solve it within a time or your answer is wrong in hard mode, the bomb will explode, and the game will be over.
